descr: "An assessment of the likely outcome(s) for a patient or other subject as well as the likelihood of each outcome."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a RiskAssessment resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "Business identifier assigned to the risk assessment."

fields.name: basedOn
fields.descr: "A reference to the request that is fulfilled by this risk assessment."

fields.name: parent
fields.descr: "A reference to a resource that this risk assessment is part of, such as a Procedure."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of the RiskAssessment, using the same statuses as an Observation."

fields.name: method
fields.descr: "The algorithm, process or mechanism used to evaluate the risk."

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "The type of the risk assessment performed."

fields.name: subject
fields.descr: "The patient or group the risk assessment applies to."

fields.name: context
fields.descr: "The encounter where the assessment was performed."

fields.name: occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "The date (and possibly time) the risk assessment was performed."

fields.name: occurrencePeriod
fields.descr: "The date (and possibly time) the risk assessment was performed."

fields.name: condition
fields.descr: "For assessments or prognosis specific to a particular condition, indicates the condition being assessed."

fields.name: performer
fields.descr: "The provider or software application that performed the assessment."

fields.name: reasonCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "The reason the risk assessment was performed."

fields.name: reasonReference
fields.descr: "The reason the risk assessment was performed."

fields.name: basis
fields.descr: "Indicates the source data considered as part of the assessment (FamilyHistory, Observations, Procedures, Conditions, etc.)."

fields.name: prediction
fields.descr: "Describes the expected outcome for the subject."

fields.name: mitigation
fields.descr: "A description of the steps that might be taken to reduce the identified risk(s)."

fields.name: comment
fields.descr: "Additional comments about the risk assessment."

fields.name: text
fields.descr:
"A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it \"clinically safe\" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety."
 derived from DomainResource
